name: MIS MAPPA and IPPs
description:
Those sentenced to life, EPP and IPP and MAPPA nominals in Y&H
YHA0001 -

dataset.name: Query 1
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_DIM_SENTENCE_TYPE.SENTENCE_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION END AS ALERT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE AT_FACT_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_SENTENCE_TYPE AT_DIM_SENTENCE_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_COURT_CASE AT_COURT_CASE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_COURT_CASE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_COURT_CASE.COURT_CASE_SK = AT_FACT_SENTENCE.COURT_CASE_SK (+)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_FACT_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_SENTENCE_TYPE.SENTENCE_TYPE_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_COURT_CASE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_COURT_CASE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION IN ('ASKHAM GRANGE (HMP & YOI)', 'EVERTHORPE (HMP)', 'HULL (HMP)', 'LEEDS (HMP)', 'LINDHOLME (HMP)', 'MOORLAND CLOSED (HMP & YOI)', 'MOORLAND OPEN (HMP & YOI)', 'NEW HALL (HMP)', 'NORTHALLERTON (HMP)', 'WEALSTUN (HMP)', 'WETHERBY (HMPYOI)') AND (AT_DIM_SENTENCE_TYPE.SENTENCE_DESCRIPTION IN ('Custody For Life - Under 21', 'Custody For Life - Under 21 CJA03', 'Custody Life (18-21 Years Old)', 'Detention During Her Majesty''s Pleasure', 'Detention For Life', 'Detention For Public Protection', 'Life Imprisonment', 'Life Imprisonment or Detention S.53(1) CYPA 1933') OR AT_DIM_SENTENCE_TYPE.SENTENCE_DESCRIPTION IN ('Indeterminate Sentence for the Public Protection', 'Life or Indeterminate Sentence for Public Protection', 'Indeterminate Sentence >10 years (Sexual and Violent Offences)') OR AT_DIM_SENTENCE_TYPE.SENTENCE_DESCRIPTION IN ('Extended Public Protection Sentence <10 years (Sexual and Violent Offences)', 'Extended Sent Public Protection CJA 03', 'Extended Sent sentenced pre October 1992', 'Extended Sentence for the Public Protection', 'Custody with Extended Supervision for violent offenders')) AND CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION END IN ('MAPPA Level 1', 'MAPPA Level 2', 'MAPPA Level 3'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SENTENCE_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)
